AI will not fully replace humans in our distributed sourcing model, but the tech should be the main support. #talentmindset
Artificial intelligence gives us the ability to "mass personalize" our recruitment efforts. #talentmindset
Smart career websites will get even smarter with automation and the adoption of computational trust. #talentmindset

We use computational trust every day: restaurant reviews, getting into a stranger's car (Uber) or staying at their house (AirBnB), things we wouldn't do based just on observational trust. #talentmindset
Computational trust is based more on data (surveys, assessments, etc.) than observational trust (what our senses tell us). #talentmindset
What will mark the inflection point when AI truly impacts recruiting? The widespread acceptance of computational trust. #talentmindset
AI is effective at performing administrative tasks and giving hiring managers time for more valuable tasks in recruiting. #talentmindset
